title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2088/89 of 12 July 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2088/89
of 12 July 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 are hereby replaced by the Annexes to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 128, 11. 5. 1989, p. 35.
(3) OJ No L 161, 23. 6. 1976, p. 10.
(4) OJ No L 200, 26. 7. 1988, p. 15.
